channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Office 2016 for Mac
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Office 2016 for Mac

item.title: CVE-2018-0819|2024-08-05T03:35:49.453Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20office%202016%20for%20mac
item.description: Microsoft Office 2016 for Mac allows an attacker to send a specially crafted email attachment to a user in an attempt to launch a social engineering attack, such as phishing, due to how Outlook for Mac displays encoded email addresses, aka "Spoofing Vulnerability in Microsoft Office for Mac."
